languages.text: "Мы избираем врагов по-разному. Я убиваю тех, кого уличает в ереси пречистая Экклезиархия. Ты — тех, на кого указывают смутные знамения. И я не знаю, насколько им можно верить".

"We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."
languages.original_text: "Мы избираем врагов по-разному. Я убиваю тех, кого уличает в ереси пречистая Экклезиархия. Ты — тех, на кого указывают смутные знамения. И я не знаю, насколько им можно верить".

traits.locale_text: "You are a dark soul... the bloodstained edge of His blade. I am a silvery glint that it has sent forth. We are at once alike and opposed."
"You are a dark soul... the bloodstained edge of His blade. I am a silvery glint that it has sent forth. We are at once alike and opposed."
"You are a dark soul... the bloodstained edge of His blade, while I am the silvery glint it sends forth into the cosmos. We are at once alike, and opposed."
"You are a dark soul... the bloodstained edge of His blade, while I am the silvery glint it sends forth into the cosmos. We are at once alike, and opposed."

"We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

"We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

"We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

languages.text: "Wir spüren unsere Feinde mit unterschiedlichen Mitteln auf. Ich töte jene, die von der erhabenen Ekklesiarchie der Ketzerei für schuldig befunden werden. Ihr hingegen verlasst Euch auf vage Omen. Und ich weiß nicht, in welchem Maße man ihnen trauen kann."
languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid eine dunkle Seele ... die blutbefleckte Schneide der Klinge des Imperators, während ich das silberne Funkeln bin, welches sie in den Kosmos schickt. Wir sind identisch und gegensätzlich zur selben Zeit."

languages.text: « Nous trouvons nos ennemis par différents moyens. Je tue ceux que l'Ecclésiarchie exaltée considère comme coupables d'hérésie. Vous tuez des personnes désignées par de vagues présages. Et je ne sais pas dans quelle mesure lesdits présages sont vraiment fiables. »
languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes une âme ténébreuse... le tranchant ensanglanté de Sa lame, tandis que je suis l'éclat argenté qu'elle envoie dans le cosmos. Nous sommes tout à la fois semblables, et diamétralement opposées. »

languages.text: «Damos con nuestros enemigos con métodos diferentes. Yo mato a los que la Eclesiarquía exaltada considera culpables de herejía, mientras que usted mata a petición de unos presagios vagos. No sé hasta qué punto se puede confiar en algo así».
languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: «Su alma es oscura... el filo ensangrentado de Su hoja, mientras que yo soy el destello plateado que emite por el cosmos. Somos tan iguales como dispares».

languages.text: 「我々はそれぞれ異なる手段で敵を見つけましょう。我は、崇高な帝国聖教会によって異端とみなされた者たちを殺します。あなたは曖昧な兆しで識別された者を殺す。そして、その兆しがどれほど信頼できるか、我には分かりません」
languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の魂は暗黒…主の刃の血に染まった刃先であり、私はその刃が宇宙に放つ銀色の輝きよ。私たちは似ているようで、正反対なの」

languages.text: “因为我们寻找敌人的手段截然不同。我消灭的是那些被国教视为异端分子的人，但你消灭的却是含混不清的预兆所指示的人，我不确定那些预兆究竟有多可靠。”
languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

traits.locale_text: “因为你是黑暗中的灵魂……是祂刀锋上的血渍，而我是祂向整个世界散发的明光。我们非常相似，但又截然不同。”

languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."

languages.text: "Düşmanlarımızı farklı yöntemlerle tespit ediyoruz. Muhterem Ekleşiarşi'nin kâfirlikten suçlu bulduklarını öldürürüm ben. Sense muğlak işaretlerle belirtilenleri öldürüyorsun. Bu işaretlere nereye kadar güvenilebileceğini bilmiyorum."
languages.original_text: "We find our foes by different means. I kill those deemed guilty of heresy by the exalted Ecclesiarchy. You kill those identified by vague portents. And I do not know to what extent they can be trusted."
